backend/main.mo: Defines state, types, and authorization mixins for BTC price tracking, credit balances, transfers, withdrawals, and admin-controlled operations in the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across layout, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication, admin guards, query client, and global layout for the main React application.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Renders an admin access denial page with principal display, session diagnostics, and retry/home navigation actions.
Shows a loading screen during admin verification with elapsed timer and optional retry or sign‑out actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning when a signed‑in user is not an admin and provides tools to copy their principal and retry the admin check.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity and clears related caches on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to submit their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Displays a USD estimate for a BTC amount or a loading/unavailable state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main header with navigation, login controls, user greeting, and admin access checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, admin warning card, page content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Provides structured best-practice troubleshooting entries for connectivity, provider issues, mempool delays, and network errors. Includes metadata and markdown-formatted guidance text.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: Searchable troubleshooting guide with categories, suggestions, and expandable best‑practice entries.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: Collapsible developer note explaining Bitcoin transaction broadcasting and security warnings.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Renders a table of transfer transactions with type labels, formatted timestamps, USD estimates, and an action to open a verification dialog. Auto-opens the verification dialog when an initial request ID is provided.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Displays detailed status for a transfer request with live refresh, copy-to-clipboard, troubleshooting navigation, and status-specific badges. Fetches and updates transfer data when opened.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: Shows a sortable admin table of withdrawal requests with status badges, copy principal, mark paid, and reject flows. Includes dialogs for confirmation and rejection with mutation hooks.
Displays summary cards for pending, paid, and rejected withdrawal requests. Highlights counts and prompts admins to review pending items.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: Collapsible developer note component showing PayPal and Stripe payout code snippets with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Displays a sortable table of withdrawal requests with status badges and optional rejection details.
Shows summary counts of pending, paid, and rejected withdrawals along with explanatory info and navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Detects when withdrawals transition to PAID and triggers one-time toast notifications per request and principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, balances, Bitcoin wallet, transactions, fees, and sending BTC via canister actor APIs.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and defines shared UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays admin verification info, principal ID, balance, and admin capabilities with BTC value estimates.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides admin tools for sending BTC, managing reserve, viewing transactions, and handling user withdrawal requests with fee estimates.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: Generates AI-driven lottery number suggestions using fallback data when live data fetch fails.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Allows users to submit Bitcoin transaction IDs to purchase credits and shows current balance with USD estimates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user's BTC-denominated balance, recent transactions, wallet info, BTC price, and withdrawal status with security notices and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows full transaction history with totals for credits, debits, and counts, and auto‑opens a specific transfer when provided.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Static page describing future puzzle-based reward credits, noting the feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Allows users to send BTC credits, calculates fees and validation, and displays transfer results with navigation to details or troubleshooting.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: Provides detailed status, analysis, and troubleshooting tools for a specific BTC transfer request.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Lets users submit manual withdrawal requests, shows balance and USD estimates, and displays withdrawal history with admin-processing notices.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Provides per-principal admin status caching with TTL using localStorage and in-memory verification tracking.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts backend Send BTC error messages into user-friendly text with special handling for address, balance, provider, and broadcast issues.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: Tracks which withdrawal request IDs have been announced as paid per principal using localStorage to prevent duplicate notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing current scope, architectural notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
